title: Vitality
content:
[Fontin](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706090346/http:/www.josbuivenga.demon.nl/fontin.html) is used for ’Vitality’. Spotted on the Dutch railway train station’s kiosks.  
It promotes healthy food.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706090346im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/vitality_1_5892.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706090346im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/vitality_2_5462.jpg)
author: Jos Buivenga

comments.content:
Congratulations with Fontin. It reflects vitality itself.  
You asked me to post a pdf-file with Liber©. That is now available on my blog. Comments are welcome.
